name: Ang's quest.
description:
Another game project with a little extra touch. This time I made myself all the game art. Im not an artist, it's know, but it gives it a special touch that I love.

Its a clicker style game, made as part of the required games on a course that I'm taking. I'm uploading here just a few that I gived a little more than was necesary to expose them as a capabilities proof and a progress record.

If you find it hard to beat, try equiping the ring that incrementes the reward, only on the two first encounters on each floor. That breaks the game a little, but it helps!
